events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision from the previous night, resulting in front bumper damage and possible airbag deployment.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords describing car collision and damage details.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the customer's case and guide them through the next steps.
The customer has been formally notified that their auto accident claim was received and is now under review.
Request sent for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the official accident report, pictures, and a mechanic's damage assessment.
Investigation into the circumstances of the collision and liability is now underway with review of submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded indicating the other party was at fault; damage assessment verified and approved for settlement.
Settlement offer prepared including repair costs and rental car reimbursement; awaiting customer's approval.
Customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and efficient handling of the claim.
Claim has been officially approved for payment based on investigation results and customer's acceptance of the offer.
Settlement payment was issued to the customerâ€™s account, covering all vehicle repairs and rental expenses.
The auto accident claim case has been formally closed with all payments completed and customer satisfied.
The completed auto accident claim records have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
